Invocation Name: vastu shastra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Vastu Shastra , which is an ancient guide and traditional Indian system of architecture 
to enhance prosperity and positivity for a home.

This skill give the basic details of Vastu shastra for a home. User can interact with Alexa, to know the details
of home by their facing direction (East, West , North & South). Also the ideal location of rooms like hall, dining room, pooja room.
kitchent, etc.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
